about_me.des: I am second year PhD student at the University of Vermont and am interested in how certain temporal and spatial factors influence the transmission of amphibian disease.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

career.nextcode_des: I have just finished my first field season where I collected toe and tail tissue from 18 sites around Vermont.
career.netease: Started at the University of Vermont
career.netease_des: I started my journey to obtain my doctorate degree at the University of Vermont, advised by Dr. Nicholas Gotelli.
career.ucloud_des: I graduated UCL with a Master of Research in Biodiversity, Evolution, and Conservation, completing two species distribution modeling projects during that time.
career.college_des: I graduated from UF with a Bachelor of Science in Wildlife Ecology and Conservation.
